original_text: and implored him that they might only touch the fringe of his garment. And as many as touched it were made well.
korean_text: 다만 예수의 옷자락에라도 손을 대게 하시기를 간구하니 손을 대는 자는 다 나음을 얻으니라

sentences.original_text: that they might only touch the fringe of his garment
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그의 옷자락에만 손을 대게 해달라고

sentences.original_text: And as many as touched it
